title: A tour of the Bills' home for the week
text:
A tour of the Bills' home for the week 
Updated: Wednesday, October 21 2015, 06:31 PM EDT 
So where are the Buffalo Bills living while they're overseas? 
The Grove, as it's called, will be home to the Buffalo Bills players for the week they spend in England. 
13WHAM's Toby Motyka takes us on a tour. A tour of the Bills' home for the week Related Stories Entertainment News
